589e81db-556b-452c-b681-8bba0d918fd7.name: Wedge Antilles
589e81db-556b-452c-b681-8bba0d918fd7.text: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of "0").

c31cfaf6-8125-4630-ab61-640cf0ea7e4d.name: Garven Dreis
c31cfaf6-8125-4630-ab61-640cf0ea7e4d.text: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

14ba5f57-84a2-4e19-98b3-6c8d288c4b09.name: Biggs Darklighter
14ba5f57-84a2-4e19-98b3-6c8d288c4b09.text: Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

8bd8cb96-cac2-4b31-abff-8b0aeee6dc1a.name: Luke Skywalker
8bd8cb96-cac2-4b31-abff-8b0aeee6dc1a.text: When defending, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

af76e998-3836-42be-bf72-d7ab4b2d4a26.name: "Dutch" Vander
af76e998-3836-42be-bf72-d7ab4b2d4a26.text: After acquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2. The chosen ship may immediately acquire a target lock.

54f2cbc0-27ff-471f-964b-a885f172e6e3.name: Horton Salm
54f2cbc0-27ff-471f-964b-a885f172e6e3.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.

ef01309f-d55a-4132-b5d5-ac01810df88a.name: "Winged Gundark"
ef01309f-d55a-4132-b5d5-ac01810df88a.text: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

b1bddb92-e1dc-4a28-bb7e-d2771e010e19.name: "Night Beast"
b1bddb92-e1dc-4a28-bb7e-d2771e010e19.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may perform a free focus action.

c3fca342-cfc0-40b2-b6f8-de232fc680ca.name: "Backstabber"
c3fca342-cfc0-40b2-b6f8-de232fc680ca.text: When attacking from outside the defender's firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

44abf37b-5801-4e9f-a211-197fe2157a18.name: "Dark Curse"
44abf37b-5801-4e9f-a211-197fe2157a18.text: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

193b883f-d4b1-441e-ac3c-fc1001f5a215.name: "Mauler Mithel"
193b883f-d4b1-441e-ac3c-fc1001f5a215.text: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

84c635bd-7747-481f-971a-7dbca6c32529.name: "Howlrunner"
84c635bd-7747-481f-971a-7dbca6c32529.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

0d2973b4-8a22-42f5-8387-71b608b3438e.name: Maarek Stele
0d2973b4-8a22-42f5-8387-71b608b3438e.text: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.

8cac4316-a773-448c-b525-317a2b5dc4c7.name: Darth Vader
8cac4316-a773-448c-b525-317a2b5dc4c7.text: During your "Perform Action" step, you may perform 2 actions.

3e4e2d0a-369b-4e46-9680-6ba58659879c.name: "Fel's Wrath"
3e4e2d0a-369b-4e46-9680-6ba58659879c.text: When the number of Damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed until the end of the Combat phase.

4fedcc94-7ea2-4ad8-bd09-2fd6b8692439.name: Turr Phennir
4fedcc94-7ea2-4ad8-bd09-2fd6b8692439.text: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

ca77e9b9-d380-4ebd-83b3-da2d78a34864.name: Soontir Fel
ca77e9b9-d380-4ebd-83b3-da2d78a34864.text: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

0591421b-88ef-45bf-a906-09e2ed9811c2.name: Tycho Celchu
0591421b-88ef-45bf-a906-09e2ed9811c2.text: You may perform actions even while you have stress tokens.

79d9c83a-97b1-42ff-aa56-b169215c4ca2.name: Arvel Crynyd
79d9c83a-97b1-42ff-aa56-b169215c4ca2.text: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.

3d91775a-0b82-4a15-94b6-b041498a09e1.name: Chewbacca
3d91775a-0b82-4a15-94b6-b041498a09e1.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

6123b030-9e79-43f7-a5e0-824f429068f6.name: Lando Calrissian
6123b030-9e79-43f7-a5e0-824f429068f6.text: After you execute a green maneuver, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action shown on its action bar.

a53a0ecb-6ec2-4e1b-b1ee-fecb48327368.name: Han Solo
a53a0ecb-6ec2-4e1b-b1ee-fecb48327368.text: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice. If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

790c1b0a-57d3-4694-bd9d-3f0664b41b34.name: Kath Scarlet
790c1b0a-57d3-4694-bd9d-3f0664b41b34.text: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 result.

b12c7c13-9d51-4ea7-82f3-85cf2c82c993.name: Boba Fett
b12c7c13-9d51-4ea7-82f3-85cf2c82c993.text: When you reveal a bank maneuver ( or ), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

dcc7525d-7f34-4152-a736-7a5ee3b9a055.name: Krassis Trelix
dcc7525d-7f34-4152-a736-7a5ee3b9a055.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

e07050ea-a58e-4cc0-8be4-d0e6993d0d87.name: Ten Numb
e07050ea-a58e-4cc0-8be4-d0e6993d0d87.text: When attacking, 1 of your results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

bbe937ea-1efa-4033-84cf-2cefb2396eef.name: Ibtisam
bbe937ea-1efa-4033-84cf-2cefb2396eef.text: When attacking or defending, if you have at least 1 stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

ebb44f28-e816-40d7-8337-aa61f5ab4473.name: Roark Garnet
ebb44f28-e816-40d7-8337-aa61f5ab4473.text: At the start of the Combat phase, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3. Until the end of the phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "12."

f8193193-eafa-4d95-853e-1040cf36a14f.name: Kyle Katarn
f8193193-eafa-4d95-853e-1040cf36a14f.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

c5038092-1cf4-4529-9e9f-97b4e3015567.name: Jan Ors
c5038092-1cf4-4529-9e9f-97b4e3015567.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

4e06a8f6-bf75-4398-91fb-adb7f3cd9523.name: Captain Jonus
4e06a8f6-bf75-4398-91fb-adb7f3cd9523.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

d4b67d77-f247-42eb-8c66-c0ce69de0eef.name: Major Rhymer
d4b67d77-f247-42eb-8c66-c0ce69de0eef.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

8500a020-3642-48cf-9940-efca4752892f.name: Captain Kagi
8500a020-3642-48cf-9940-efca4752892f.text: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

bde424f3-c778-4387-9ff5-6950d02715c0.name: Colonel Jendon
bde424f3-c778-4387-9ff5-6950d02715c0.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

d8d80156-b43f-4dc6-a1c4-0f21062c346f.name: Captain Yorr
d8d80156-b43f-4dc6-a1c4-0f21062c346f.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

c3c9adc9-8817-4084-afd1-ed21a20d0353.name: Lieutenant Lorrir
c3c9adc9-8817-4084-afd1-ed21a20d0353.text: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the ( 1) or ( 1) template instead of the ( 1) template.

1ff3c9df-58eb-42c5-b613-136911b4308a.name: Tetran Cowall
1ff3c9df-58eb-42c5-b613-136911b4308a.text: When you reveal a maneuver, you may treat the speed of that maneuver as "1," "3," or "5".

786bcca5-bfa4-4d37-b76e-4b4e390b4ae1.name: Kir Kanos
786bcca5-bfa4-4d37-b76e-4b4e390b4ae1.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add 1 result to your roll.

2a56d00c-be2a-4254-9e3f-c4fc6d7bfb18.name: Carnor Jax
2a56d00c-be2a-4254-9e3f-c4fc6d7bfb18.text: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.

845baffa-ddcd-4d5f-b771-492a70e7648c.name: Lieutenant Blount
845baffa-ddcd-4d5f-b771-492a70e7648c.text: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

db2eb5af-9338-49b1-887a-4077fd0267d2.name: Airen Cracken
db2eb5af-9338-49b1-887a-4077fd0267d2.text: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action.

fd8cdaf2-ae04-4546-9d37-17095d7da391.name: Colonel Vessery
fd8cdaf2-ae04-4546-9d37-17095d7da391.text: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

b2f24266-e073-4b7d-aad2-ab58ab68974b.name: Rexler Brath
b2f24266-e073-4b7d-aad2-ab58ab68974b.text: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

ae03c41c-8a91-45db-8f6e-27cdb001604d.name: Etahn A'baht
ae03c41c-8a91-45db-8f6e-27cdb001604d.text: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its results to a result.

89eebd79-fcbb-4d92-b8f7-45069d83a48d.name: Corran Horn
89eebd79-fcbb-4d92-b8f7-45069d83a48d.text: At the start of the End phase, you may perform one attack. You cannot attack during the next round.

120ad045-554a-46ee-b150-6f9c3e0fb588.name: "Echo"
120ad045-554a-46ee-b150-6f9c3e0fb588.text: When you decloak, you must use the ( 2) or ( 2) template instead of the ( 2) template.

0e519624-5bea-485b-91f4-89642763242b.name: "Whisper"
0e519624-5bea-485b-91f4-89642763242b.text: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus to your ship.

142c80ce-8e14-41f8-9d9a-d9ea679b1e59.name: CR90 Corvette (Fore)
142c80ce-8e14-41f8-9d9a-d9ea679b1e59.text: When attacking with your primary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to roll 1 additional attack die.

eeb565a5-801d-47c7-89d5-bc2a320d7698.name: Wes Janson
eeb565a5-801d-47c7-89d5-bc2a320d7698.text: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from the defender.

70104b47-00d6-4d42-85d6-7e29291b03b2.name: Jek Porkins
70104b47-00d6-4d42-85d6-7e29291b03b2.text: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die. On a result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to this ship.

6f8de271-8144-4b88-8de6-e22ef29bbe8a.name: "Hobbie" Klivian
6f8de271-8144-4b88-8de6-e22ef29bbe8a.text: When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

0b1c4a3b-7522-4bdf-8a75-3446d1f908d8.name: Tarn Mison
0b1c4a3b-7522-4bdf-8a75-3446d1f908d8.text: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

cdd388a9-e021-40a8-a2c0-db13e52c4c6f.name: Jake Farrell
cdd388a9-e021-40a8-a2c0-db13e52c4c6f.text: After you perform a focus action or are assigned a focus token, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

818efbe4-3b82-482e-bd28-183cb0c98434.name: Gemmer Sojan
818efbe4-3b82-482e-bd28-183cb0c98434.text: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

33f1745b-10ec-45b1-8394-257e583bf447.name: Keyan Farlander
33f1745b-10ec-45b1-8394-257e583bf447.text: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your results to results.

e7e2fa9a-43f3-4196-a0cc-8eb82b6a8ace.name: Nera Dantels
e7e2fa9a-43f3-4196-a0cc-8eb82b6a8ace.text: You can perform secondary weapon attacks against enemy ships outside your firing arc.

18befc17-7909-4f76-8e5d-e830e9bae632.name: Eaden Vrill
18befc17-7909-4f76-8e5d-e830e9bae632.text: When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

68f58f06-69f3-4f87-8189-d70008b658e6.name: "Leebo"
68f58f06-69f3-4f87-8189-d70008b658e6.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve, and discard the other.

e2567465-a86d-4a12-b351-658a0647e661.name: Dash Rendar
e2567465-a86d-4a12-b351-658a0647e661.text: You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.

dca91c07-fe02-4dff-a613-8df30527a3e2.name: Captain Oicunn
dca91c07-fe02-4dff-a613-8df30527a3e2.text: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 damage.

c4298a00-b860-4762-9968-c0318852d868.name: Commander Kenkirk
c4298a00-b860-4762-9968-c0318852d868.text: If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.

4a823217-e766-45e7-b88e-0e6121a122a7.name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
4a823217-e766-45e7-b88e-0e6121a122a7.text: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

07079dc2-2a6d-4deb-8ed2-95735a132f0e.name: Prince Xizor
07079dc2-2a6d-4deb-8ed2-95735a132f0e.text: When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncanceled or result instead of you.

271de7dd-029f-42ec-a587-f297bc030342.name: Guri
271de7dd-029f-42ec-a587-f297bc030342.text: At the start of the Combat phase, if you are at Range 1 of an enemy ship, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

9179e3f5-1181-44fc-9685-263638fb1dd8.name: Serissu
9179e3f5-1181-44fc-9685-263638fb1dd8.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, it may reroll 1 defense die.

88d3eea7-4a82-42d9-83aa-f24c10ee2ebf.name: Laetin A'shera
88d3eea7-4a82-42d9-83aa-f24c10ee2ebf.text: After you defend against an attack, if the attack did not hit, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

a3ab9fca-15d5-4de6-8051-e245c57872fe.name: IG-88A
a3ab9fca-15d5-4de6-8051-e245c57872fe.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

e4a97eaf-28ba-49d0-8ac5-67f8654467d6.name: IG-88B
e4a97eaf-28ba-49d0-8ac5-67f8654467d6.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

69682429-981e-4909-8b4e-cda05995f38e.name: IG-88C
69682429-981e-4909-8b4e-cda05995f38e.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

ff035d21-77ba-4efe-82cd-a491c404d2e9.name: IG-88D
ff035d21-77ba-4efe-82cd-a491c404d2e9.text: You may execute the ( 3) or ( 3) maneuver using the corresponding ( 3) or ( 3) template.

7fef28a4-fb5d-4242-b428-ccdec9761672.name: N'Dru Suhlak
7fef28a4-fb5d-4242-b428-ccdec9761672.text: When attacking, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

18d7b52c-2c73-4f76-a0a6-2604094e6e69.name: Kaa'To Leeachos
18d7b52c-2c73-4f76-a0a6-2604094e6e69.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from another friendly ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

1a456d9e-c214-4822-9c49-fe91cd3b8c0d.name: Boba Fett (Scum)
1a456d9e-c214-4822-9c49-fe91cd3b8c0d.text: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at Range 1.

803dd372-9b56-4656-8e00-8fb105bed585.name: Kath Scarlet (Scum)
803dd372-9b56-4656-8e00-8fb105bed585.text: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

250824c0-a319-416c-a0a8-c0bbe7e0c863.name: Emon Azzameen
250824c0-a319-416c-a0a8-c0bbe7e0c863.text: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [ 3], [ 3], or [ 3] template instead of the [ 1] template.

e5eebdf8-8db5-452e-9091-c0a4e40fe580.name: Kavil
e5eebdf8-8db5-452e-9091-c0a4e40fe580.text: When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

45f8be8d-5779-4c9d-9b4b-6808ddb29249.name: Drea Renthal
45f8be8d-5779-4c9d-9b4b-6808ddb29249.text: After you spend a target lock, you may receive 1 stress token to acquire a target lock.

df5b7301-4f82-4fdf-96ff-4fad9a5fbe86.name: Dace Bonearm
df5b7301-4f82-4fdf-96ff-4fad9a5fbe86.text: When an enemy ship at Range 1-3 receives at least 1 ion token, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

fc689486-0bfd-4cf1-8cf6-47aff1e0a414.name: Palob Godalhi
fc689486-0bfd-4cf1-8cf6-47aff1e0a414.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from an enemy ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

5adf3d65-564f-41dd-9e2e-b04bef0e5f61.name: Torkil Mux
5adf3d65-564f-41dd-9e2e-b04bef0e5f61.text: At the end of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. Until the end of the Combat phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "0".

0d259b6d-cc6c-434d-becb-06685b6a5691.name: Commander Alozen
0d259b6d-cc6c-434d-becb-06685b6a5691.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1.
